name: Escape (itch) (Matthew Hansen)
description:
Escape, a satirical depiction of modern life and everyday society encapsulates what it means to live. Life is about means, means to an end an unescapable end. A side scrolling game that fine tunes our attention to the fact that what matters in life is the decisions we make and the time spent making them.

One thing in life is inevitable, that is we are on a slow march to oblivion and that is what this game encompasses; the depiction of life.

A perfect representation of modern life.

"In life its either you live or you leave, either ways you don't escape" - Matthew Hansen
